member.name: P:Queue`1.head
member.summary: The first node (head) in the Queue

member.name: P:Queue`1.tail
member.summary: The last node (tail) in the Queue

member.name: P:Queue`1.count
member.summary: The number of nodes in the Queue

member.name: M:Queue`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of items in the Queue

member.name: M:Queue`1.Enqueue(`0)
member.summary: Adds a value to the end of the Queue
member.param: The value to append, of type T

member.name: M:Queue`1.Dequeue
member.summary: Remove the firts node of the Queue
member.returns: The first value of node removed

member.name: M:Queue`1.Peek
member.summary: Remove the firts node of the Queue

member.name: M:Queue`1.CheckType
member.summary: Checks if input is queue type

member.summary: Create a node to store data for the Queue

member.name: P:Queue`1.Node.value
member.summary: The value that the node contains
member.value: The value property gets/sets the value property of type T

member.name: P:Queue`1.Node.next
member.summary: The next node in the linked list
